silvia-narduzzi,Silvia,Narduzzi,"UCB, Rare Diseases - Senior RWE Expert",,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C5616AQFaW_fH1I1FKA/profile-displaybackgroundimage-shrink_350_1400/0/1517598130848?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=LsnJtmwZBPnj3QrMw0WwCvjA--xMeXU4uxGH2SiJQ1E,personal,ACoAAA03pGgBKfOudEfzRMQrtPj0ZK4_RiuuONI,221750376,,"Current Position: Senior (Quantitative) Epidemiologist
Specialist Skills:
SME in Post-Authorisation Safety Studies (PASS) and Epidemiology methods
Sound experience in:
- Real World Evidence studies
- Multi-country studies
- Drug Safety Studies for PRAC/EMA
- Writing/reviewing protocols for PASS studies (epi and stat)
- Writing/reviewing synopses/protocols (epi and stat)
- Methodological research and review of statistical analysis plans including templates for tables and analyses
- Designing questionnaires
- Designing and developing surveillance programs/studies/reports
- Writing and presenting study plans, results, reports, scientific literature, papers
- Collaborating and leading cross functional teams.
- Ability to identify issues and provide recommendations for improvement/risk minimisation.
- Excellent interpersonal, organizational, and supervisory skills.
Software and Data Management skills:
- SAS (SAS Base, SAS/GRAPH, SAS/STAT and SAS/MACRO, SAS Enterprise Guide), SQL language for SAS, STATA, ArcGIS
- Programming and validation of outputs and deliverables (validation of content, consistency with planned analyses).

- Develop methods to integrate, manage, query and analyze millions of records from primary and secondary care data (Surveys, Registries, Hospital Discharges, Emergency Accesses, Ambulatory Care Visits, Drug Use, GP records, etc).
Field of Studies:
Neurology and Children Neurodevelopment, Respiratory Diseases, Endocrinology, Obesity and lipid profile, Diabetes, Cardiovascular Diseases, Oncology, Allergies
Study Designs:

Observational studies (Cohort, Case-cohort, Cross-sectional, Case-crossover, Case-control, Sequential cohort approach)","{'country': 'Netherlands', 'short': 'Utrecht Area', 'city': None, 'state': None, 'default': 'Utrecht Area'}",False,False,[],"{'primary_locale': {'country': 'IT', 'language': 'it'}, 'supported_locales': [{'country': 'IT', 'language': 'it'}], 'profile_languages': [{'name': 'Inglese', 'proficiency': None}, {'name': 'Italian', 'proficiency': 'NATIVE_OR_BILINGUAL'}]}",Hospital & Health Care,"[{'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}}, 'school': {'name': 'Sapienza Università di Roma', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQF5OJVPD2RZjA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856449258?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=m1sX8gSiWfBRLvoFSypegm6Vd2vIY17nxSl2Ho2Bp60', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/sapienzauniversitadiroma/'}, 'degree_name': ""Master's degree"", 'field_of_study': 'Statistics'}, {'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'school': {'name': 'Università degli Studi di Messina', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQHTwrcQ6tECQg/company-logo_400_400/0/1604313542459?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=QTpSQcPUL_QsJ8frIhTG_y-p90I5wEK9QDO-R5tNmv0', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/unimeofficial/'}, 'degree_name': 'Master of Science -
